title: It is a kind of cursive font, I think!!!
content:
please identify this font

please identify this font for me, as given in the ATTACHMENT

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803051344/http:/typophile.com/files/font_11.JPG) | 7.42 KB |
author: scram

comments.content: It looks like IBM Selectric (typewriter) Script. I am not aware of any digital version.

Script 12 Pitch [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/script-12-pitch/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803051344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/script-12-pitch/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/script-12-pitch/")  
a digital font by Bitstream based on the IBM Selectric Script typeface.  
If your document is from before the 1990s it was typed. Here is a character set from the IBM Selectric Script

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803051344im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IBMSelectricScriptSM_4558.jpg)
  
T my eves the digital version looks slightly heavier.  
Don

Dear Oldnick

thanks a ton!.

your effort is gratefully acknowledged

I am so happy

thanx once again!
